subject: Marketing sample request for simsonn pedals, I posted on reddit about you and the post is getting viral
description_text:
Hi team, as you have the best support I have ever seen honestly, I posted
about your plus x pedals on reddit and as expected the post started getting
viral because my account is almost 3 years old and I have good karma score
on reddit, it got almost 300 views and a comment and I posted it just 8
minutes ago. I have thought to post about them for a few days daily, I just
added an image of them, do you send free samples for marketing, I'd love to
make a video with me speaking about them and I'll keep posting it on
reddit, you are really missing on reddit, I have sold a lot of services on
reddit worth over 10k usd till now so I am really good at reddit marketing.
I will make a video with my own voice and post it on reddit if I have them,
hope you will send it and I can also share the reddit posts link if you
want (my id is giveawayguy786) please send me marketing samples and I'd
love to promote on different platforms mainly on reddit as I have really
good, trusted and old account in there

PS: till I wrote this much the views have now crossed 500, it's literally
viral, many views coming in per second.

Thanks a lot
